parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the [[Position|position]] of a location. If the location is attached to an object, that object's position is returned.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''locationPosition''' location

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [x,y,z], where z is <tt>-1 * [[getTerrainHeightASL]]</tt> at the location
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_locationPos = [[locationPosition]] myLocation;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[nearestLocation]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[getPos]] [[player]], "nameCity"];
_locationPos = [[locationPosition]] _location;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setPosition]], [[createLocation]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearestLocations]], [[position]], [[size]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
